title: Admin Blog Post Payload
description: Payload sent from the admin portal when publishing a blog post.

id.description: Client-generated unique identifier for the post. The backend may ignore this and generate its own ID.

title.description: Human-readable title of the blog post.

excerpt.description: Short teaser used in lists and cards.

coverImageUrl.description: Cover image for the post. In the admin UI this is a data URL (base64) or a regular URL.

authorRole.description: Short label describing the author's role, e.g. "Digital Marketing Expert".

readTimeMinutes.description: Estimated read time in minutes, calculated from content length.

sections.description: Ordered content blocks that make up the body of the post.

id.description: Client-generated unique identifier for this block.

type.description: Block kind used to drive rendering on the frontend.

heading.description: Text for heading blocks. Optional for other block types.

text.description: Body text for paragraph and list blocks. For lists, each line break represents a separate list item.

ordered.description: Only for list blocks. true = numbered list (ol), false = bullet list (ul).

imageUrl.description: Only for image blocks. In the admin UI this is a data URL (base64) or regular URL.

alt.description: Alternative text for image blocks for accessibility.

createdAt.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when the post was first created in the admin panel.

updatedAt.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when the post was last updated.
